body.p: The text of the unaccompanied standard, IFRS 15, is contained in Part A of this edition. The text of the Basis for Conclusions on IFRS 15 is contained in Part C of this edition. Its effective date when issued was 1 January 2017. In September 2015 the Board issued Effective Date of IFRS 15 which deferred the effective date to 1 January 2018. This part presents the following documents:

ol.li:
APPENDIX
Amendments to the guidance on other Standards
